biocontainers.name: giira
biocontainers.summary: Giira is a gene prediction method that identifies potential coding regions exclusively based on the mapping of reads from an rna-seq experiment.

biotools.summary: GIIRA is a gene prediction method that identifies potential coding regions exclusively based on the mapping of reads from an RNA-Seq experiment.

bioschemas.summary: GIIRA is a gene prediction method that identifies potential coding regions exclusively based on the mapping of reads from an RNA-Seq experiment.
